amendment.description: To ensure that patients are receiving safe and accurate dosages of compounded drugs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1013 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1013 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S8681, S8683; text: CR S8683) To ensure that patients are receiving safe and accurate dosages of compounded drugs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1013 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bond.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1013 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
